articles.title: Uyghurs: China may have committed crimes against humanity in Xinjiang - UN
articles.description: China urged the UN not to release the report - Beijing called it a "farce" arranged by the West.
articles.content:
By Matt Murphy & Flora Drury & Tessa WongBBC News
The UN has accused China of "serious human rights violations" in a long-awaited report into allegations of abuse in Xinjiang province.

articles.author: Travis Caldwell, Andy Rose and Omar Jimenez, CNN
articles.title: The first bus carrying migrants from the US-Mexico border in Texas arrives in Chicago, officials say
articles.description: The state of Texas, which for several months has bussed thousands of newly arrived migrants at the US-Mexico border to New York City and Washington, DC, has set a new metropolitan area as a destination: Chicago.
articles.content: (CNN)The state of Texas, which for several months has bussed thousands of newly arrived migrants at the US-Mexico border to New York City and Washington, DC, has set a new metropolitan area as a dest… [+3541 chars]

articles.title: Democrat Mary Peltola beats Sarah Palin in Alaska special election
articles.description: Mary Peltola, a Democratic former state lawmaker, won a special election to fill Alaska's sole U.S. House of Representatives seat, becoming the first Alaska Native to represent the state in Congress, the Alaska Division of Elections announced on Wednesday.
articles.content: Aug 31 (Reuters) - Mary Peltola, a Democratic former state lawmaker, won a special election to fill Alaska's sole U.S. House of Representatives seat, becoming the first Alaska Native to represent the… [+2035 chars]

articles.author: Jeremy Herb, Tierney Sneed, Kara Scannell, Holmes Lybrand and Marshall Cohen, CNN
articles.title: Trump tells court that classified material should have been expected in presidential records found at Mar-a-Lago
articles.description: Former President Donald Trump argued in a court filing Wednesday that the National Archives should have expected to find classified material among the 15 boxes Trump turned over in January from Mar-a-Lago because they were presidential records.

articles.author: Brady Dennis, Sarah Kaplan
articles.title: Jackson, Miss., shows how extreme weather can trigger a clean-water crisis
articles.description: This week's water crisis in Jackson, Miss., portends what could happen in other U.S. communities, as climate change pushes under-resourced and overburdened water systems to the brink.
articles.content:

articles.title: Airport baggage handler Jermani Thompson killed in freak conveyor belt accident
articles.description: The freak accident happened as Jermani Thompson, 26, was unloading a Frontier Airlines plane parked at Louis Armstrong New Orleans International Airport Tuesday at around 10 p.m.
articles.content:
A baggage handler at a New Orleans airport was killed when her hair got tangled in the machinery of a belt loader, officials said Wednesday.
